title: Add the downloaded file cachepolicy settings by BackgroundDownloader
body: A store app uses BackgroundDownloader download a FTP URI. After the first successful download, BackgroundDownloader caches the resulting file.Regardless of whether the FTP server is online or the file is updated, downloaded again will be successful to get a cache file. Do not uninstall this App case, how to download again the latest file in real time from the same FTP URI ?
